project.description:
Abstract 'bundle.tests' imports two packages, one from 'bundleA' and one from 'bundleB'. One of the packages is split between 'bundleA' and 'bundleB' and this test asserts that Tycho is able to correctly resolve 'bundle.tests' dependencies during compilation and when running the tests.
Explanation P2 supports only a subset of Import-Package directives supported by OSGi. Some examples of Import-Package directives not supported by P2 and relevant sections of OSGi Core Specification 4.1. - bundle-symbolic-name and bundle-version directives, Section 3.5.4 "Import-Package Header". - attribute matching, Section 3.6.5 "Attribute Matching" and Section 3.6.6 "Mandatory Attributes". - include directive, Section 6.1.12.49
This project demonstrates dependency resolution for split packages configured with attribute matching, but the same applies to other Import-Package directives not supported by P2.
